definition: The outermost layer of the body that covers and protects it, typically used to refer to the skin of humans and animals. It is commonly used to describe the body's largest organ and its various functions, such as sensation, protection, and temperature regulation.

examples.german: Die Haut ist das größte Organ des menschlichen Körpers.
examples.english: The skin is the largest organ of the human body.

examples.german: Sie hat eine sehr empfindliche Haut.
Er hat eine Narbe auf der Haut.
examples.english: He has a scar on his skin.
